said he won't formally endorse anyone until he actually sees who is on the 2012 ticket. "I am not committed to Barack Obama . I'm not committed to a Republican candidate," Colin Powell said. Honestly, I didn't want to go back in, said Allen Iverson , who scored 20 points through three quarters. "I felt that our second team should have closed that thing out."
